name: JaiRuta
description: Multi-Stop Route App for Transport Workers, published on App Store. Developed with SwiftUI and MVVM. Designed for delivery and messaging services, optimizing routes and improving efficiency.

name: PocketAccountant
description: Personal Finance Management App built with SwiftUI, Swift-Data, and CloudKit for cross-device synchronization. Implemented MVVM architecture, widgets, Siri integration, and shortcuts for seamless user experience.
